name: Candy Kart Racing 3D Lite - Speed Past the Opposition Edition!
name_original: Candy Kart Racing 3D Lite - Speed Past the Opposition Edition!
description:
"Buckle Up! This is Gonna Be One Sweet Ride..."

Jump in your Candy Kart and take to the gingerbread road
in this fast paced yummy tasting racing game for kids!

FEATURES INCLUDE:

• Easy controls - just tilt to steer
• Awesome 3D graphics
• Replay the Action whenever you want and share the footage on your favourite social network
• Sweet soundtrack
• Fast and furious racing

Download now 100% FREE...
